mng: to join, to fit, to mate, to mix, to match, to deserve, to make up (a prescription), to allocate

exm.mng: matching, fitting in with, compatible with, to correspond, to fit, to conform to, rapport, to coordinate with, to act in concert with, to cooperate, to become man and wife, to combine parts of machine
to deploy, to allocate, configuration, allocation
component, part, fitting, accessory, replacement part
to form a complete set, coherent
to be well matched, to suit
to distribute, to assign, to allocate, to partition (a hard drive)
to pair up, to match, to arrange in pairs, to add sth into a group
